specific_question: What percentage of our current EV battery design features AI-enhanced battery management for our North American market as of Q2 2025?
answer: 40% of our current EV battery design features AI-enhanced battery management for our North American market as of Q2 2025.
justification: This answer provides a baseline understanding of the current state of AI-enhanced battery management in our EV design, helping to inform the potential impact of implementing AI-enhanced battery management on EV battery lifespan.
dr_question: Can we leverage AI-enhanced battery management to improve EV battery lifespan by 15%?
